Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
Nice trendy cafe with a good vibe.  Tasty cappuccino.
Order via the Jamezz app, order is brought to your table.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: One of my favourite places to go for lunch. If you like TEDS, you'll probably enjoy this place as well. The chicken-avocado sandwich is phenomenal and they have great homemade ice tea. â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
Super lovely spot.
Great for Breakfast, brunch or just a cup of coffee. â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Select your own seating but order yourself inside. They will bring you your food. Eggs Benedict was good. Chocolate avocado pastry sounds good in concept but was not tasty at all. Overall, just okay.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
One of the best cafes Iâ€™ve ever been in Amsterdam, from the staff to the food!
Are you looking for a place to have a good time alone, with a friend/partner or even make new friends! Ya here we are ;)

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
Friendly hosts
Nice vibe
Best croissants in town :)

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: De waserette has a relaxed, yet warm atmosphere. With an open kitchen, you can see the fresh bread that was baked off earlier in the morning and your eggs florentineâ€™s being cooked. The food is delicious also.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Nice cafe/restaurant in de Pijp, close to the Albert Cuyp market. The staff here are nice. It's possible to order from the phone, and sit both inside or outside. Nice selection of hot drinks.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Let me say we went on an adventure before discovering this place ! We were wandering in Pijp looking for food, I think we had a spot we wanted to go, you know one of the "overhyped" place. And I think that we gave up because there was way â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Great location, great menu, friendly staff, fairly quick service (we were there at prime-time lunch hour aka 12.30PM). The sandwiches are really to die for, well layered and the flavours work very well together. My aunt enjoyed the â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Great food! I recommend the chicken, avocado and bacon! Don't forget to order at the bar! Also the coffee is good!

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Nice place for an early morning coffee and breakfast on the way to work. Good FriedHats coffee. Chicken avocado pancetta sandwich done as a salad of my favourite!

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Great and easy food. With the QR code on your table you can order and pay through your phone. Worked really good.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Good coffee, eggs benedict overdone with not my fav bread and too vinegary sauce, chicken sandwich was tasty though. Crowded. Nice stuff.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: We loved this cafe so much that we went a few times during our trip to Amsterdam. Great coffee and service. Hearty and tasty food too.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: The chicken avocado sandwich is amazing, one of the best meals I ate in Amsterdam (and I was the 5th time in Amsterdam)

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: We had an excellent brunch at De Wasserette once again. Quick and friendly service. Delicious benedict eggs and exquisite pain perdu. The expresso was really good, also. We will come back, definitely.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Very good place to eat toasts; food quality is awesome.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: It's a cute and cozy spot with loads of outdoor seating available. The food itself was standard but not memorable.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: One dish to rule them all the avocado, chicken & pancetta with parmezan cheese. And if that's really not your thing then everything else is great too. Very busy always as it's a local Hotspot for the incrowd. Good chance of spotting celebs.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
Nice place well located with an outside terrasse and friendly feeling.
Though one downside, the black American coffee comes only one size; quite small

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Food is always good here, my favourite is the avocado chicken (best in town). Coffee is great. Would recommend.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Lovely spot & nice drinks

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
Super Nice brunch place.
Kip avocado sandwich & schrimp croquettes were super Nice.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Delicious coffee, best avocado sandwich in Amsterdam - crispy bacon, spicy chicken thighs, truffle mayonnaise and Parmesan, to die for!

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Terrible! Overpriced food in the Pijp. Waiters seem to have no clue what they are doing; they gave the wrong order and while we mentioned that this was not our order they kept insisting it was our order. In the end the table next to us (of â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text:
Absolutely amazing sandwiches. Perfect lunch place!
So popular that you might expect some waiting time. We ordered the Salmon Eggs Benedict and the one with Goat Cheese. Both yummy delicious but the Salmon was â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: I think this cafe has a lot more potential than it is. Itâ€™s a nice menu at an affordable price, eggs Benedict was disappointing, brioche is nice but overall very average something Iâ€™d cook at home. Was cold too, egg and hollandaise. The â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Exactly what we wanted for a Saturday brunch, located on a lovely square and although rightly busy there were plenty of seats. Coffee was top notch and we inhaled the food. Great start to the day.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: I love it there. Wonderful people work there and service is amazing

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Good food and great location. We had luckily one of the tables inside but the staff didn't greet us. None of them. After 5 to 10 minutes we no noticed that we had to order at the bar. People/ staff make the place if you ask me so I would say that this is definitely something to improve on.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Relatively busy at the weekends, with staff that seems a little stressed, as well as food that tastes allright, but one suspects it could have used a little less stress in the kitchen. Menu and coffee are nice, but probably its a better place to come during the week or when less busy...

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Cannot understand why the place was packed - food very average and took 40 mins to arrive, sourdough had no taste and had texture of regular white bread - a con? Then huge front door was opened permanently  because "it's busy" - we ended up eating in our coats...inside the cafe! Reserve a table at Old Collins around the corner instead!!

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Charming cafÃ© with tasty food, we went there for a brunch and I had chicken/avocado/manchego on a toast while my friend took eggs Norwegian. We were both happy with the food (the chicken was good but not amazing though). Coffee are really â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: I recommend this as a great place for coffee and brunch. I often go there. But beware the waiters if you catch them on a bad day. The last time I went they forgot my order completely so they became quite angry with me, the customer. LOL

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Very nice brunch place with fresh ingredients and super nice menu !

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: The barista is dreadful (tall with dark hair in a ponytail and light beard). Clearly loathes his job.  After talking for a long period to one of his friends with coffee waiting to be served, he eventually picked it up dumped it on my table. â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Favourite place for breakfast and lunch in the city. Service is great, coffee is great, food is fresh and very tasty. â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Basic brunch place. The avocado on toast was dry, and didn't taste of anything. The waiters are all pretty miserable too. Plenty of better options in the area.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Another restaurant that lost his mojo on the way. It used to be simple food now it has become really bad. I ordered a lam burguer really well done, what do I got a medium mostly red. I was feeling do much like having a burger that I made no â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Great little place in a prime location. It's usually quite busy, but service is fast and polite. â€¦

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: A welcome oasis for breakfast,  when few other places are open. Hearty granola with sour yogurt and exceptionally flavourful hazlenuts, an excellent croissant and very well-made coffee certainly jump-start ed my day.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: This was a lovely place to have a relaxing breakfast. The food was amazing. It was really busy but the outside seating made it a nonissue.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: It's good and cheap. However, there is no waitress, the dishes are quite simple. If been to better brunch places.

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Great service and great food. 5 stars!

Name: De Wasserette
Review Text: Excellent service. Many smiles and warm welcome. As a foreigner I felt right at home. You have the do-it-yourself or full service options. Go full service and come back 4-5 hours later to pick it up. Enough time to go around town.

Name: De Wasserette

Review Text: Nice staff, great coffee... my favorite sandwich is the sour dough sandwich w/ filet american. Also a big+ are the heaters outside on the terrace.
